Theme.Name: Theme Settings
Theme.Label: Configure Theme
Theme.Hint: Customize colors, sizes, and appearance of the BG3 HUD
Theme.Title: Theme Settings
Theme.GeneralHint: Parameters applied to all components below if not specified.

NormalOpacity.Name: Normal Opacity
NormalOpacity.Hint: The opacity of the HUD when visible (0.1 to 1.0)

FadedOpacity.Name: Faded Opacity
FadedOpacity.Hint: The opacity when the HUD fades out after inactivity (set to 1.0 to disable fading)

FadeOutDelay.Name: Fade Out Delay (seconds)
FadeOutDelay.Hint: How long to wait before fading out the HUD (1 to 30 seconds)

AutoScale.Name: Auto Scale
AutoScale.Hint: Automatically scale the UI based on screen height

UIScale.Name: UI Scale
UIScale.Hint: Manual UI scale percentage (50% to 300%). Only used when Auto Scale is disabled.

UIPosition.Name: UI Position
UIPosition.Hint: Where to position the HUD on the screen

PosPaddingBottom.Name: Bottom Padding
PosPaddingBottom.Hint: Padding from the bottom of the screen (pixels)

Appearance.MenuHint: Adjust opacity and fade timing for the HUD

Layout.MenuHint: Adjust scaling and positioning of the HUD

FoundryUI.MenuHint: Control macro bar visibility and tooltip timing

GMHotbar.MenuHint: Configure GM hotbar visibility and container density

Lock.NoSettingsWarning: Please right-click the lock button to select which settings to lock.
